title.value: Влияние условий содержания на воспроизводительные способности коров и качество получаемой продукции
Effect of housing conditions on reproductive capacity of cows and the quality of livestock products

journal.title: Animal Agriculture and Veterinary Medicine : quaterly research and practice journal

person.name: Medvedskij, V.A., Vitebsk State Academy of Veterinary Medicine (Belarus)

abstract.value: The article presents data on housing cjnditions of cows in lightweight structures and in the structures of the capi-taltype built from a standard desing; data on the reproductive capacity of cows as well as information on milking equipment of live-stock houses. It has been established that the level of cow reproductive capacity and the quality of livestock products to a great extent depend on animal welfare and production facilities
